name: Hometown Inc
description: Manufacturer of leather footwear intended to provide bespoke leather goods to customers. The company's footwear includes shoes for men and women, sandals, and electronic gadget covers that are made from pure leather which is sourced from selected local tanneries, enabling customers to get handmade products that reflect traditional craftsmanship.
